item.title: Offer downloadable map files for more countries and regions
item.description:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on June 08, 2011 23:34:39
At the moment the mapsforge FTP server ( ftp://ftp.mapsforge.org/ ) offers map files only for Germany and its 16 federal states. This is way too little. We should aim to offer map files for all European countries and also for other countries on other continents (like for example the USA, Australia and Japan).
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=127

item.contents:
From fritz.mu...@gmail.com on June 21, 2011 06:19:59
There are lots of files available for gmapsup.img format. Lots are also based on OSM. Look for example on: http://downloads.cloudmade.com/ or: http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OSM_Map_On_Garmin/Download If alternate use of this widly distributed format wule be possible - or an conversion to the mapsforge format - this would immediatley enable worldwide coverage of maps and open the way for the apps starting to use this libs. (I use LOCUS). Used to use GLOPUS on Windows mobile some time back - and had good experience with this format lots of free sources available (e.g. altitude line files...) Thanks for this interesting project !
